title: Add Tavily web search to morning briefing
description:
Add web search capability to morning briefing for news/learning opportunities section.

Implementation:
1. Sign up for Tavily API (https://tavily.com) - free tier: 1,000 searches/month
2. Add TAVILY_API_KEY to .env
3. Add web-search tool to Initialize State tools array
4. Add HTTP Request node to call Tavily API when Claude uses the tool
5. Update system prompt to include news/learning section in briefing

Note: Google Custom Search API had persistent 403 errors despite correct setup.
